const String &  resourceGroup 
) [virtual]

Loads the specified image file into the texture.

The texture is resized as required to hold the image.

Parameters:

uint  buffWidth,
uint  buffHeight,
PixelFormat  format 
) [virtual]

Loads (copies) an image in memory into the texture.

The texture is resized as required to hold the image.

Parameters:
buffPtr Pointer to the buffer containing the image data
buffWidth Width of the buffer (in 0xAARRGGBB pixels)
buffHeight Height of the buffer (in 0xAARRGGBB pixels)
Returns:
Nothing.

void CEGUI::HgeTexture::setHgeTextureSize ( uint  size  ) 

set the size of the internal hge texture.

Previous hge texture is lost.

Parameters:
size pixel size of the new internal texture. This will be rounded up to a power of 2.
Returns:
Nothing.
